page.title: 03HEALTH
page.content: MOST FOODS ARE ALRIGHT BUT IF YOU EAT TOO MUCH OF THEM THEY WILL BE BAD FOR YOU.HYGIENE IS MOST ESSENTAIL BECAUSE LACK OF IT WILL MEAN ILLNESS OR EVEN DEATH! IF YOU HAVE PETS IT IS BEST TO KEEP THEM CLEAN OR THEY WILL SPREAD GERMS, ESPECIALLY DOGS. WHEN I DID A SURVEY I FOUND THAT OF 26 CHILDREN 25 SAID THAT THIS COUNTRY'S HYGIENE COULD BE INPROVED, I HOPE SO IN THE FUTURE! EVERYTHING IS BAD FOR YOU IF TAKE IT IN LARGE QUANTITIES. FOR INSTANCE MATHS AND SLEEP! MOST PEOPLE SLEEP FROM NINE TILL SEVEN WHICH IS A GOOD TIME.EXERCISING MAKES YOU FIT AND IF YOU ARE FIT YOU ARE HEALTHY.
